text:
League 1
Toulouse - OL: revealing statistics on Memphis Depay!
Facing the TFC, Memphis Depay gave the victory to OL (2-3). The latter is the club player involved on the most goals in Ligue 1 since last season.
03 Nov 2019, 07:00 by Charlie Creteur



After a good performance against FC Metz with the captain's armband (2-0), Memphis Depay has donned the costume of savior against Toulouse. While his team was led to score, the Dutch equalized in the 26th minute. Later, he gave the goal of victory on a solitary rush in overtime (90 + 5, 2-3). With Moussa Demb√©l√©, he is one of the most successful Lyon players.




Involved in 28 goals since last season




7 goals in Ligue 1 for Depay, this season + 9 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

According to Opta Jean, Memphis Depay is the player of the Rhone club involved in the most goals in Ligue 1 since the beginning of last season, 28 goals (17 goals, 11 assists). The latter is already 7 goals in the championship since the beginning of the season and proves that he is one of the major players in the squad.
